data.description: Schema and data used as provided.
DB-Dump contains fk-constraints and correct columns deduct 0.25 for missing/errors eg. no fk-constraints, wrong columns.
ERD schema is provided in /XX_JS-PHP_A/db-dump/ Folder.
Table for event ratings created Fields: event_id, rating, comment, creation_date.
Table for sessions ratings createdFields: session_id, rating, creation_date.
Enter information for a new event Deduct 0.25 point per mistake..
Enter already used slug for a new event.
Enter invalid slug for an event.
Not possible to change an event of a different organizer by submitting the form against a different event (changing the action parameter of the form in the html).
Not possible to see an event of a different organizer by changing the id or slug in the url.
Show form for new ticketA3b – Enter information for a new ticket.
Enter information for a new session.
Enter invalid information for a new session – room booked.
Enter information for a new channel.
Enter information for a new room.
Read all detail information of a single event Success, invalid event, invalid organizer, event belongs to a different organizer.
Attendee login Success, two attendees with same lastname but different registration code and vice 6versa, invalid lastname or registration code, invalid request parameters.
Attendee logout Success, invalid token, already logged out.
New event registration Success, invalid token, already participated, ticket is no longer available.
Get registrations of a user Success, invalid token.
Templates have been used Header, login, event list, create/view/edit event.
Display session details on click of registered session.
Enter registration mode and information should come from API.
Able to select ticket successfully and cost reflects on the bottom field.
Select workshop session and the cost reflects on the bottom field.
Purchase function works as described from test project.
Frontend available at http://<hostname>/XX_JS-PHP_B/ No mark if wrong name
All data from/to server passed using REST API
TPersistent state Reloading any page shows the same page again (Event detail page, with logged in attendee).
Frontend layout follows the designed mock-ups.
Choice of colors, typography, spacing between the elements enhanes the overall look and feel.
When creating a new presentation or clearing the editor, one root element initially appears in the center of the screen
WThe editor/viewer project is accessible via required URL
The element has 4 interactive areas, (1, 2, 3, 4), which are hidden by default and are displayed only after mouse hover on the element.
When clicking on one of the interactive areas, a related element should appear on the side of the areas node on which the click was made. Link should also be created.
It is possible to change the content of element by wysiwyg editor
It is possible to change the captions for each sections deduct
It is possible to delete of element by delete button
Any changes done inside slide editor is saved automatically and will be restored upon refresh.
When deleting an element, all link of this element must also be deleted
The user can delete a link by click on the link and pressing the Delete/Back Space key
Elements can be moved by mouse dragging around the editor, links should also follow the element.
It is possible to link two unrelated elements with the Shift key held down and move a section of one element to a section of another element.
Able to navigate via keyboard 1,2,3,4 keys
Viewing begins with the root element.
The view mode can be seen in full screen mode
An indicator is present to show where you are at the moment Just need to be there, not required to be functional.
It is possible to link two unrelated elements with the Shift key held down and move a section of one element to a section of another element.
Navigation control presented on the screen with the caption from associated interaction areas (navigation button, direction, caption of destination)
It is possible to go to the desired element. Need to be functional.
Content is correctly displayed. Content input in the editor is shown in the viewer. Content follows rich text editor format.
The style of the transition animation corresponds to the direction of movement between the elements in view mode
Quality of used animation for editor.
Quality of used animation for transition between elements in view mode.
Qll navigation elements are developed in accordance with the WCAG and standard ARIA (Accessible Rich Internet Applications Suite)
Create modular and reusable JavaScript code.
